page.title: 18RECENT EVENTS IN DENHOLME
page.content: The{closing of the bank}as uneconomic in l985 caused dismay and people had to adapt by using the Post Office or banks elsewhere. A security firm collects the school dinner money! In l983{fire} destroyed part of the{ {mill}. For safety the distinctive { {connecting bridge}had to be demolished. The local school watched this carefully engineered event. In l985 a fire damaged a{furniture {warehouse}. In May l985 three inhabitants,{Peter {Greenwood,}deputy head of a Bradford school for the deaf, and his sons {Felix(l3)}and{Rupert(11)}died, with 52 others, in the disastrous{fire}at {Bradford City football ground.}This event upset the whole village and much sympathy was expressed and support given to Mrs. Greenwood and her daughter Jessica.
